title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\HttpFaultAbort
name: HttpFaultAbort
description:
Specification for how requests are aborted as part of fault injection.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.HttpFaultAbort

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.http_status
params.description: The HTTP status code used to abort the request. The value must be between 200 and 599 inclusive.

params.name: data.percentage
params.description: The percentage of traffic (connections/operations/requests) which will be aborted as part of fault injection. The value must be between 0.0 and 100.0 inclusive.
